https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/70n8lUZOmEKSWlQYzh8fHHLqqu9.jpg Silvio refuses to fight for the fascists and joins the resistance with Elena. After the war, his vitriolic newspaper articles cause him to be sentenced to imprisonment. A Difficult Life
